we-are: We are a non-profit organization, of Colombian nationality, established on March 25, 2004, in Bogot√°.
objective: The objective and importance of the entity has been in the accompaniment of Private, Public and International Organizations, in training programs, Informal, scientific and pedagogical training within the development needs of the entities, communities, building processes that have allowed investigative processes in the social, economic and political, allowing the generation of real solutions to the specific needs of Colombian society.
experience: The entity's experience is extensive in the private and public fields. Always committed to the needs and contribution to society, generating from within projects and processes that have benefited many Colombians.
